Introduction

Kim In-hye, known under her stage name HU’E, is a South Korean singer and dancer under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as a member of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

She was first known for competing on the survival show My Teenage Girl under the stage name In-hye, where she was eliminated in episode 11 after ranking 15th place.

On May 15, 2024, HU’E was revealed as the fourth member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
